entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as one of the visitors to Harry's new room.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as Aunt Petunia's brother and a visitor to Harry's new room.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is the owner of the room and his belongings are described in detail.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is moving into the new room and is described as sitting on the bed staring around him.

relationships.description: Dudley owned an air-rifle which was kept in his room.
Dudley put his foot through the television set when his favourite programme was cancelled.
Harry moved everything he owned from the cupboard to his new room.
